name: Hero's Journey (itch) (codefiddler)
description:
Does not work in Safari, please use Firefox or Chrome

Join us on a tour of the Hero's Journey, where our hero sets off on a quest for his collectables and returns home changed. Narration heavy, so sound on, please!

WASD/Arrow Key Movement, Mouse to Aim, Space to Dodge towards cursor

Credits: Burt Grinstead - Art/Voices

Joe Grinstead - Programming

Sound Effects and Music sourced from freesound.org

Music Credits: (User Names on freesound.org):  

BaDoink, theojt, eliasyian, FlatHill, tranquility.jadgroup, theojt, szegvari, Staticpony1, Davidsraba, Jammerboy70, danlucaz, AR503

The code is online at https://github.com/grinstead/heros_journey
